definition: Myanmar (formerly Burma) (abbr. for 緬甸|缅甸[Mian3 dian4])
suburbs or outskirts/one of the five degrees of official mourning attire in dynastic China/official in charge of fields (old)
Union of Myanmar, official name of Burma 1998-2010

sentences.english: Censorship of printed and audiovisual media.
sentences.chinese: 緬甸的印刷媒體和視聽媒體均受政府監控。

sentences.english: Mr Yettaw, who has been ill since his arrest in Burma, wore the mask to guard against infection.
sentences.chinese: 他在緬甸被捕以後，染病戴着口罩是爲了防止感染。

sentences.english: China has a big stake in Myanmar.It is the country’s leading foreign investor. Myitsone is one of manyhydropower, mining and infrastructure projects there.
sentences.chinese: 中國在緬甸擁有重大利益，是該國重要的外國投資者。

sentences.english: People visit the Shwedagon Pagoda during the yellow robe weaving festival in Yangon, Burma (Myanmar).
sentences.chinese: 在緬甸傳統的直桑岱點燈節，人們參觀仰光大金塔。

sentences.english: The black sesame market is taken by the comparatively safe Myanmar sesame.
sentences.chinese: 黑芝麻市場被相對安全的緬甸芝麻所佔領。

sentences.english: Imperial Britain savaged India and Burma.
sentences.chinese: 英帝國殘暴地攻擊印度和緬甸。

sentences.english: He fled to Thailand following Burma's pro-democracy uprising in 1988.
sentences.chinese: 在1988年的緬甸民運起義動亂後逃到泰國。

sentences.english: Mohinga, rice noodles in fish soup, is widely considered to be Burma's national dish.
sentences.chinese: 魚板面，即魚湯米粉，被普遍認爲是緬甸的大衆食物。

sentences.english: Neutralism is the cornerstone of neutralism foreign policy.
sentences.chinese: 中立主義是緬甸外交政策的基石。

sentences.english: The Irrawaddy has never disappointed the Burmese.
sentences.chinese: 伊洛瓦底江從未讓緬甸人失望過。

sentences.english: Myanmar has a total of 13 main border trade points with its four neighboring countries.
sentences.chinese: 緬甸與其毗鄰四國共有13個主要貿易口岸。

sentences.english: The US also wants to discuss North Korea and Burma.
sentences.chinese: 這名官員表示，美國還希望討論朝鮮和緬甸問題。

sentences.english: Myanmar issued on Tuesday night a curfew order in the country's biggest city of Yangon.
sentences.chinese: 緬甸昨晚在該國最年夜都會仰光公告宵禁令。

sentences.english: Muslin Halal shops will usually write the letter "786" in Myanmar numeral.
sentences.chinese: 穆斯林清真商店通常會寫字母“786”緬甸的數字。

sentences.english: But the casualties on the Burmese Army's side were not known.
sentences.chinese: 但是緬甸政府軍方面是否有傷亡尚未可知。

definition: ASEAN/abbr. for 東南亞國家聯盟|东南亚国家联盟[Dong1 nan2 ya4 Guo2 jia1 Lian2 meng2]

local/regional/district (not necessarily formal administrative unit)/region/area/as suffix to city name, means prefecture or county (area administered by a prefecture-level city or county level city)/CL:個|个[ge4]
